thread.section_title: OptiContacts.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OptiContacts.com | opticontacts.com | 17 of 517
thread.title: C. Gent

author: C. Gent
title: C. Gent
text: My only issue is that the screen showed next day air shipping was the free option for my with my promo code and they ended up shipping the contacts via ground shipping. Had I really needed the contacts that fast, this could have been an issue. Since my contacts are a manufacturer price limited item, sales are not applicable and shipping is the only real differentiator companies have. If your website says free one day shipping, I'd recommend ensuring that is the case.
